sentences.sContent: All these recipes exemplify my cooking: healthy, delicious and quick.
sentences.sContent_eng: All these recipes exemplify my cooking: healthy, delicious and quick.
sentences.sCn: 所有这些食谱例证了我的饭菜：健康、美味、快捷。

sentences.sContent: Samson, one of the heroes of the Hebrew scriptures, seems to exemplify a different understanding of the power of hair: his awesome strength abandoned him as soon as his locks were trimmed.
sentences.sContent_eng: Samson, one of the heroes of the Hebrew scriptures, seems to exemplify a different understanding of the power of hair: his awesome strength abandoned him as soon as his locks were trimmed.
sentences.sCn: 参孙，希伯来圣经里的英雄之一，似乎例证了一种对头发的力量的不同理解：他的非凡力量随着头发被剪掉而消失。

sentences.sContent: However, there is no guarantee that that change will be the change you exemplify.
sentences.sContent_eng: However, there is no guarantee that that change will be the change you exemplify.
sentences.sCn: 不过，没人能够保证那些改变会是如同你所示范的那个样子。
